snippet: Three books report on the microscopic creatures that live in our bodies, and their influence on how we function.
abstract: Sonia Shah reviews books The Diet Myth: Why the Secret to Health and Weight Loss Is Already in Your Gut by Tim Spector, The Good Gut: Taking Control of Your Weight, Your Mood, and Your Long-Term Health by Justin and Erica Sonnenburg and The Hidden Half of Nature: The Microbial Roots of Life and Health by David R Montgomery and Anne Bikle.
lead_paragraph: Three books report on the microscopic creatures that live in our bodies, and their influence on how we function.

headline.main: ‘The Diet Myth,’ ‘The Good Gut’ and ‘The Hidden Half of Nature’
